Question: Varjo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Varjo

Aero

- Ultra-clear display
- Automatic IPD adjustment
- Standard USB-C cable
- Compact and sleek design
- 2,880 x 2,720 pixel Mini LED displays
- 115-degree field of view
- Professionally calibrated displays with 99% sRGB and 95% DCI-P3 accuracy
- Mini LED LCD panels with 2000 LEDs each
- Bright displays for vibrant, bright scenes
- Excellent color performance
- Advanced ergonomics with adjustable head strap, forehead adjustment strap, and visor angle adjustment dial
- Unique lenses with convex central portion and smooth lens structure
- Eye-tracking system with automatic IPD adjustment
- Powered by a single 5-meter long USB Type-C cable
- Not included: headphones, base stations, controllers
- System requirements: quad-core processor, 32GB of memory, Nvidia-based GPU
- Price: €1,990
- Enterprise VR technology trickle down to consumer market
